Title: Extends the authorization for Chautauqua county to impose an additional one percent rate of sales and compensating use taxes
Summary: Extends the authorization for Chautauqua county to impose an additional one percent rate of sales and compensating use taxes until November 30, 2027.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to extending the authorization for Chautauqua county to impose an additional one percent rate of sales and compensating use taxes
